title: London Churches Pack
subtitle: Visit select historic churches across London
description: A curated collection of notable churches in London – perfect for discovering architectural and spiritual landmarks.

entries.title: Westminster Abbey
entries.description: The Collegiate Church of Saint Peter at Westminster; Gothic royal church in London, coronations and royal burials.

entries.title: St Paul’s Cathedral
entries.description: The Anglican cathedral on Ludgate Hill in London; designed by Sir Christopher Wren in the late 17th century.

entries.title: St Mary Abbots, Kensington
entries.description: Parish church in Kensington, London; large Victorian church, prominent steeple and local landmark.

entries.title: St Mary Redcliffe (Bristol)
entries.description: While not in London, included here as grand Gothic example – large and ornate example of English Gothic architecture.

entries.title: Salisbury Cathedral
entries.description: Cathedral Church of the Blessed Virgin Mary in Salisbury; early English Gothic, with England’s tallest church spire.
